text.div:
Generated Narrative: ValueSet vaccine-medication-codes-snomed

This value set includes codes based on the following rules:

  • Include codes fromhttp://snomed.info/sct version Not Stated (use latest from terminology server) where concept is-a 372763006 (Amantadine (substance))
  • Include codes fromhttp://snomed.info/sct version Not Stated (use latest from terminology server) where concept is-a 51361008 (Product containing amantadine (medicinal product))
  • Include codes fromhttp://snomed.info/sct version Not Stated (use latest from terminology server) where concept is-a 372532009 (Rimantadine (substance))
  • Include codes fromhttp://snomed.info/sct version Not Stated (use latest from terminology server) where concept is-a 108712009 (Product containing rimantadine (medicinal product))
  • Include codes fromhttp://snomed.info/sct version Not Stated (use latest from terminology server) where concept is-a 387010007 (Zanamivir (substance))
  • Include codes fromhttp://snomed.info/sct version Not Stated (use latest from terminology server) where concept is-a 116100000 (Product containing zanamivir (medicinal product))
  • Include codes fromhttp://snomed.info/sct version Not Stated (use latest from terminology server) where concept is-a 412261005 (Oseltamivir (substance))
  • Include codes fromhttp://snomed.info/sct version Not Stated (use latest from terminology server) where concept is-a 386142008 (Product containing oseltamivir (medicinal product))
  • Include codes fromhttp://snomed.info/sct version Not Stated (use latest from terminology server) where concept is-a 64520006 (Protamine sulfate)

name: VaccineMedicationCodesSnomed
title: Medications
description: Value set for medications and substances based on SNOMED CT, including both active ingredients and marketed products.
